title: What is Maasha Pinda Sweda? - Quora

response.answer_text: New word for me… Masha pinda sweda=स्वीडन के लिए प्रतीक्षा करें I’ll search on google https://www.ijrap.net/admin/php/uploads/1974_pdf.pdf Swedana (sudation) is a common procedure which is practiced as Poorva karma (pre-operative) before any Panchakarma. Pinda (bolus) Sweda is a kind of passive body heat therapy, which is known to cause systemic hemodynamic changes. Pinda Sweda refers to the Swedana done in the form of the Pinda.

Hey! Maasha Pinda Sweda or Masha Pindasweda is a form of pindasweda to treat doshas such as Pakshaghata.Masha boosts the energy of the body and also improves the strength of muscles.It also helps in overcoming sexual impotence and aids in low sperm count.A bolus is prepared from Masha and it helps in improving joint pains, tones the muscles, arms, legs, etc.I hope this was helpful :)
